meaningMnemonic: <radical>Flowers</radical> growing out of a <radical>rice paddy</radical> into the shape of a <radical>cross</radical> are really <kanji>showy</kanji> <kanji>flower</kanji>s.
readingMnemonic: These <kanji>flower</kanji>s are too <kanji>showy</kanji>. You hate them. You hate these showy flowers so much you run them over with your <reading>ca</reading>r (か)!
